name: Alain L√©veill√©

review_translated_text:
I contacted R2Pro in the spring of 2024 to replace the exterior siding on my property.

From the first contact (with Gabriel), a bond of trust was established.

Gabriel has a good grasp of the process involved in carrying out such a project, and he takes care to explain every detail.

Between that first visit and the completion of the work, Gabriel was always very available and patient (I asked a lot of questions :-)).

He and his team (especially William) demonstrated the same professionalism and commitment throughout the work, which was completed in the fall.

Having suffered a fairly serious injury in September, Gabriel and William even agreed to do a few extras, outside of the scope of the project, to help me out a bit.

I greatly appreciated these small gestures, which demonstrate their commitment to customer satisfaction.

I retained R2Pro's services for another project in 2025.

I recommend them without hesitation.

Alain
